text:
The XHTML doctype needs an internet connection as it requires access to
www.w3.org. Probably the entity resolver doesn't find the appropriate local DTD.
creator: andreas@apache.org
egli@apache.org
text:
michi:
> > yes, I think this is needed. It's really annoying
andreas:
> It seems to be related to the entity resolver.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
i wonder whether the cocoon resolver works correctly, because we don't change a
thing, and the xhtml dtds are definitely there.

I added the Catalog Resolver to the parser (DocumentBuilder), but i'm not sure
from where it get the propertie file (CatalogManager.properties).
Anyway it seems to work.
creator: edith@apache.org
